title: Rolf Prima EOS AR 16 Spoke All-Road Wheelset
content:
Oregon-based wheel company Rolf Prima is rolling out a new addition to their all-road wheel line. The new EOS AR is their most advanced, performance-bred wheel to date…

Like the existing ARES AR offering, the new wheels feature a 25mm wide, 40mm deep carbon rim profile and hooked rim design. They add to that platform with an all-new carbon layup, reduced spoke count to 16 spokes front and rear, XD-15 ceramic bearings, and stealth cerakoted hub shells for increased longevity and striking aesthetics. The full wheelset weighs only 1385 grams.

Despite the low spoke count, the EOS AR has no rider weight limit, speaking confidently about the strength and durability of the wheelset. Rolf Prima says that placing the spokes together makes an inherently more aerodynamic wheel and equalized spoke-pull creates snappy acceleration and allows the use of fewer spokes – as evident across their line.

With the EOS AR’s unique shape and rim properties, they were able to reduce the spoke count further, offering a 16/16 disc brake wheel for the first time in the company’s 25 year history.

The new EOS AR is available now and retails for $2999.00. See more at Rolf Prima.

The post Rolf Prima EOS AR 16 Spoke All-Road Wheelset appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
